title: Congressional Tribute to Constance Baker Motley Act of 2013
content: Congressional Tribute to Constance Baker Motley Act of 2013 - Authorizes the President Pro Tempore of the Senate and the Speaker of the House of Representatives to make appropriate arrangements for the posthumous presentation, on behalf of Congress, of a gold medal of appropriate design in commemoration of Constance Baker Motley , in recognition of her enduring contributions and service to the United States.
